text: Pen kal palawl olap pagak, ñɨg cheb Silowam gol okok agak. Pagɨl, binɨb anep kagol pɨs ak kɨlop paklak, ak nepɨm agak. Pen nɨbi agɨnɨgabɨm, Jelusalem binɨb ogɨnap tap si tap tɨmel sɨkol gɨlak tek, kɨli pen tap si tap tɨmel awl yɨbɨl ak gel God gek kal anɨb ak pagɨl kɨlop paklak agɨnɨgabɨm agak.
